1929: 1929 27 year old William S Paley becomes CBS president
1963: 1963 WOUB TV channel 20 in Athens, OH (PBS) begins broadcasting
1967: 1967 WJAN TV channel 17 in Canton, OH (IND) begins broadcasting
1970: 1970 WHAG TV channel 25 in Hagerstown, MD (NBC) begins broadcasting
1997: 1997 Bryant Gumbel co-hosted his final "Today" show on NBC-TV
